subproject.description:
1.1 Implementation of a Multi-Year Phased National Implementation Plan for the NFA is supported.

1.2  Resource mobilization and material support strategy for national disaster mitigation and management with its action plan is developed and their implementation is supported.

1.3 National Research capacity including NEMA’s is enhanced to assume duties to conduct required risk assessments, develop disaster management plans and set standard operating procedures to effectively deal with emergencies.

2.1NEMA partnerships at all levels are strengthened.

2.2 Public awareness and education and training for DRR are improved.

2.3 Local communities in both rural and urban areas have strengthened their disaster resilience through systematic capacity building support, and are able to partner with Soum authorities undertaking necessary measures for preparedness, response and mitigation of disaster risks within their capacity.

2.4 Supporting structures for Community-based disaster management are set at related NEMA branches and Soum Government level, and are capable for coordinating government DRR efforts with initiatives of CBDM groups.

3.1 National Climate Risk Management (NCRM) Strategy is developed, and capacity for its implementation is strengthened.

3.2 Public awareness and education to support implementation of National Climate Risk Management Strategy are increased.
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: Disaster Phase III
